name: Micro Matic USA
overview:
Micro Matic USA, Inc. supplies draught beer equipment in the United States and internationally. The company offers kegerator conversion kits; beer tap handles; beer taps and shanks, such as faucets, faucet locks, shanks, tools, and parts; beer line cleaning equipment, including pressure cleaners, cleaning kits and cans, cleaning solutions, brushes, and accessories; beer regulators; gas cylinders; beer keg tap couplers; beer glass cleaning products; commercial keg refrigerators; draft beer towers; beer drip trays; keg party pumps; CO2 keg party dispensing products; and bar commercial refrigerators. It also provides beer line hose; keg beer system fittings, such as keg beer system tailpieces, nuts, washers, elbows, clamps, and splicers/unions; jockey boxes; event dispensing products; air cooling system components; glycol cooled components; beer equipment tools and accessories; beer liquid management products; beer gas equipment; wine and cider dispensing equipment; and draft beer system components, as well as kegerator informational videos, articles, and FAQs.

The company was founded in 1953 and is based in Northridge, California. Micro Matic USA, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Micro Matic A/S.
